processes_tree.name: ip link set dev enp1s0 xdp off
tc qdisc replace dev enp1s0 clsact
tc filter del dev enp1s0 egress
tc filter add dev enp1s0 egress proto all prio 1 handle 1 bpf da pinned /sys/fs/bpf/fire/tc_egress

Creates hidden files, links and/or directories
Uses the "uname" system call to query kernel version information (possible evasion)
Reads system information from the proc file system
Sample tries to set files in /etc globally writable
